commands.name: calendar
commands.description: Get the entire term calendar delivered to you by Gerbot!

commands.name: weather
commands.description: Displays the weather from a specific city!

commands.name: pubsub
commands.description: Get information on the delicious subs!

commands.name: report
commands.description: DM Gerbot to send an anonymous report to the staff!

commands.name: xkcd
commands.description: Grab a xkcd comic of your choice. Use randxkcd to get a random xkcd comic!

commands.name: role
commands.description: Assigns yourself a specific class role, and creates if it's the first time.
